Posts.Content: Sep 12, 2017 04:42AM Happiness2 wrote: I was diagnosed at Stage IV BC in Oct 2014 and after Xeloda and then Ibrance/Letrozole for 10months I had no signs of cancer in Dec 2016. Then in July 2017 3 small Mets in bone appeared and I began LSZ 102 trial on August 17, 2017. I will be getting FES PET Scan on Sept 14, 2017 to check on Mets and I am hoping for improvement.
Posts.Title: How long have you been Stage IV? goldie0827 dormouse
